abstract: Bank of America said Wednesday that it would buy back about $4.5 billion in auction-rate securities held by roughly 5,500 customers nationwide as part of a settlement agreement with Massachusetts regulators.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said Wednesday that it would buy back about $4.5 billion in auction-rate securities held by roughly 5,500 customers nationwide as part of a settlement agreement with Massachusetts regulators.

headline.main: Bank of America Will Buy Back Securities
